body: It's not addressed, but my guess is it's just a chest wrap rather than a bra. The artist has specifically advertised the book as including feminization and the succubus mocks him referring to how he was an "onii-san" but is now an "onee-san"
I cant read moonspeak but judjing by 9th image the victim had bra covering her small breasts
@manowar, the victim was originally male but transformed into a female.
this is not gender bender, just breast expansion
I'll make sure to support him. Can i purchase it digitally?

Taku has said that he does not want his books posted on sites like this, but now that it's up, please at least make sure to support him by purchasing it. He worked his butt off on this one, completing the whole thing in just a few weeks.
